message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get your hands on something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product, but I'm looking to spend closer to $90. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer, but I'm afraid $90 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $105. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. Would you be willing to come down to $95? This would be a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go down to $95 just yet. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $102. This is the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great deal for both of us!
